definition: Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: The keepers, Fiori and Kalac , trained apart.
sentences.chinese: 门将费奥里和卡拉奇，在一旁训练。

sentences.english: Hello, My name is Tessa and I live in Karachi .
sentences.chinese: 您好，我的名字是泰莎和我住在卡拉奇。

sentences.english: And Pierre began to have the same feeling towards Karataev.
sentences.chinese: 皮埃尔也开始对卡拉塔耶夫抱着同样的感情。

sentences.english: If the king was still alive, he could unite the Mon Calamari and the Quarren.
sentences.chinese: 如果先王还在位，他会联合蒙卡拉马里人和夸伦人。

sentences.english: Carla then expanded her scope to include speed swimming and synchronized swimming.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉然后她的范围扩大到包括高速游泳和花样游泳。

sentences.english: Which Cylon sabotages the Galactica's water supply in the aptly named "Water"?
sentences.chinese: 在“水”一集中，哪个塞昂破坏了卡拉狄加的水供给？

sentences.english: Today was the grand opening and Karla and Melanie were lost .
sentences.chinese: 今天才刚隆重开幕，卡拉和梅拉妮也在里面迷路了。

sentences.english: Karamanlis said that Greece attaches great importance to developing relations with China.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉曼利斯说，希方重视发展对华关系。

sentences.english: Rock category with a K-carrageenan a rally.
sentences.chinese: 可与矸类K一型卡拉胶形成凝聚。

sentences.english: The next time you’re at a Karaoke bar or maybe at home singing in front of your TV, try singing an English song.
sentences.chinese: 下次你可以尝试在卡拉OK或在自己家唱英文歌。

sentences.english: Mr. Karras, a doctoral student in education at Ohio State.
sentences.chinese: 在俄亥俄州立大学攻读教育学博士的卡拉斯先生。

sentences.english: The Reds midfielder is undecided whether he will follow team-mate Jamie Carragher by taking his coaching badges.
sentences.chinese: 红军队长还未决定是否跟随队友卡拉格考取教练证书。

sentences.english: On coming back to Pokhara I started work on my project in earnest.
sentences.chinese: 在回到博卡拉后我开始认真的做我的项目。

sentences.english: She turned from the phone and yelled out Carla’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她转过身来叫着卡拉的名字。

sentences.english: The carraways are something of a clan .
sentences.chinese: 卡拉韦家族是一户望门贵族。

sentences.english: Speaking to reporters in Karachi at the end of his visit.
sentences.chinese: 内格罗蓬特在访问即将结束时在卡拉奇对记者讲话。
